label: DS3604: Reflective Electrophoretic Display
description: The DS3604 is a 4.2-inch reflective display with 400 x 300 pixels supporting Black/White/Red visuals. It offers customizable templates, remote updates, ultra-low power consumption, and up to 5 years of battery life. Compatible with LoRaWANÂ® gateways, it's ideal for remote management in varied applications.
